ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // Bugenhagen
“The knowledge of the Ancients swirling around
here is telling me one thing.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Cloud}
“Search for Holy…
How do we do it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cloud}
“{Aeris} had the White Materia…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Cloud}
“But when {Aeris} died, it fell from
the altar…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // {Cloud}
“That's why…this is the end.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:126}); // {Cloud}
“I didn't notice it the last time I came.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:127}); // {Cloud}
“This place…is similar to the inside
of the Lifestream.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:129}); // {Cloud}
“…The noise doesn't go through your ears
but directly into your head.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:130}); // {Cloud}
“It seems to mean something…
but I can't quite get it.
I hate not knowing what it is.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:131}); // {Cloud}
“That's what this is similar to.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:146}); // {Cloud}
“So {Aeris} came here, too…
She stood in this exact spot…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:147}); // {Cloud}
“Hmm…
{Aeris} didn't have to come here.”{PAUSE}“She was able to find out all the
information here.”{PAUSE}“What {Aeris} needed was that
altar…and only that.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:148}); // {Cloud}
“{Aeris}…
“{Aeris}…
What were you planning to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:149}); // {Cloud}
“What…are we supposed to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:84}); // {Cloud}
“Underwater?
There's…no way…
We need a submarine…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:85}); // {Cloud}
“Wait.
Submarine…I think there's one
at {CYAN}Junon Port{WHITE}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:132}); // {Tifa}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:139}); // {Tifa}
“My head feels like it's getting crushed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:133}); // {Cid}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:140}); // {Cid}
“My head feels like it's gettin' crushed!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:134}); // {Barret}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:141}); // {Barret}
“My head feels like it's gettin' crushed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:135}); // {Red XIII}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:142}); // {Red XIII}
“My head feels like it's getting crushed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:136}); // {Cait Sith}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:143}); // {Cait Sith}
“My head, it's about to be crushed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:138}); // {Vincent}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:145}); // {Vincent}
“My head is about to be crushed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:137}); // {Yuffie}
“Now that you mention it…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:144}); // {Yuffie}
“My head's about to pop.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:86}); // Bugenhagen
“Oh! You've found it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:81}); // Bugenhagen
“Remember, a place (even sunlight can't
reach) is where the (key) is…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:82}); // Bugenhagen
“(even sunlight can't reach)…
Hmm…if we're above ground,
the sunlight reaches everywhere…
Then it's probably not above ground…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:83}); // Bugenhagen
“A place where sunlight doesn't reach…
Right, it must be underwater!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:86}); // Bugenhagen
“Oh! You've found it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Bugenhagen
“The Planet's in a crisis…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // Bugenhagen
“A crisis beyond human power or endless time.”{PAUSE}“It says, when the time comes,
we must search for 'Holy'.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // Bugenhagen
“Holy…the ultimate White Magic.
Magic that might stand against Meteor.
Perhaps our last hope to save
the Planet from Meteor.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // Bugenhagen
“If a soul seeking Holy reaches the Planet,
it will appear.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo.”{PAUSE}“Meteor, Weapon,
everything will disappear.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // Bugenhagen
“It is up to the Planet to decide.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // Bugenhagen
“What is best for the Planet.
What is bad for the Planet.”{PAUSE}“All that is bad will disappear.
That is all.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo.”{PAUSE}“I wonder which we humans are?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // Bugenhagen
“Speak to the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Get the White Materia… This
will bond the Planet to humans.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // “Then speak to the Planet.”{PAUSE}“If our wish reaches the Planet,
the White Materia will begin to glow
a pale green.”

ops.raw: d0 f5 fe 34 fe 8b 00 54 ff 07 fe 8a 00

dialogStrings:
You cannot take on any more Materia.
Please discard some Materia.

{Cait Sith}
“Heidegger is going after you all.”{PAUSE}“That's why it's dangerous out there.
Let's go underground!”

{Tifa}
“What's wrong?
Are you still looking for something?”

{Barret}
“Wassup, Mr. Monster?
What're you lookin' at?”

{Vincent}
“Doesn't look like it's after us.
Something else…”

{Yuffie}
“Huh? It's looking somewhere else.
Doesn't it want to fight us?”

{Cait Sith}
“Let's go back to the Airship.”

{Vincent}
“We should go back to the ship now.”

{Cait Sith}
“Oh no!
We gotta get outta here!”{PAUSE}“Something big…
I'm talkin' REALLY BIG's comin'!”

{Cait Sith}
“Oh no!
Let's hurry out of here!”{PAUSE}“Something big…
I'm talkin' REALLY BIG's comin'!”

Bugenhagen
“The knowledge of the Ancients swirling around
here is telling me one thing.”

Bugenhagen
“A crisis beyond human power or endless time.”{PAUSE}“It says, when the time comes,
we must search for 'Holy'.”

Bugenhagen
“Holy…the ultimate White Magic.
Magic that might stand against Meteor.
Perhaps our last hope to save
the Planet from Meteor.”

Bugenhagen
“If a soul seeking Holy reaches the Planet,
it will appear.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo.”{PAUSE}“Meteor, Weapon,
everything will disappear.”

Bugenhagen
“It is up to the Planet to decide.”

Bugenhagen
“What is best for the Planet.
What is bad for the Planet.”{PAUSE}“All that is bad will disappear.
That is all.”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo.”{PAUSE}“I wonder which we humans are?”

{Cloud}
“Search for Holy…
How do we do it?”

Bugenhagen
“Speak to the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Get the White Materia… This
will bond the Planet to humans.”

“Then speak to the Planet.”{PAUSE}“If our wish reaches the Planet,
the White Materia will begin to glow
a pale green.”

{Cloud}
“But when {Aeris} died, it fell from
the altar…”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo…
the key…”{PAUSE}“It is written about the key here…”

{Cid}
“Way to go, gramps!
You're not just another old coot!”

{Vincent}
“I never expected to find a person who could
read and understand this difficult
writing nowadays.”

Bugenhagen
“I'm not an Ancient.
I can't read this thing!”

Bugenhagen
“I may be old, but my eyes aren't
completely bad yet.
Look closely below the writing.”

{Cloud}
“There's something written in chalk…
…(even sunlight can't reach)…(Key)”

Bugenhagen
“It was probably written by a scientist
who's been here…
He probably used all his energy
to make out these two words.”

{Cloud}
“So this note points to where the key is?”

Bugenhagen
“I don't know…
But, it probably has something to
do with our riddle.”{PAUSE}“The riddle…then it must have something
to do with {Aeris}.”

{Cloud}
“There's a note written in chalk…
…(key)…(in the Music Box)”

Bugenhagen
“That Music Box over there.
We'll put the key in it.”

Bugenhagen
“Probably…”{PAUSE}“Use these words as clues
and go find the key.”{PAUSE}“I'll continue to figure out
the Ancients' writing.”

{Cloud}
“A place (Even sunlight won't reach) is
where the (key) is, right?”

Bugenhagen
“When you find the key, or when you can't
go any further, come back here.”{PAUSE}“Maybe I'll understand more from the writing
and get some new information for you.”

Bugenhagen
“Remember, a place (even sunlight can't
reach) is where the (key) is…”

Bugenhagen
“(even sunlight can't reach)…
Hmm…if we're above ground,
the sunlight reaches everywhere…
Then it's probably not above ground…”

Bugenhagen
“A place where sunlight doesn't reach…
Right, it must be underwater!”

{Cloud}
“Underwater?
There's…no way…
We need a submarine…”

{Cloud}
“Wait.
Submarine…I think there's one
at {CYAN}Junon Port{WHITE}.”

Bugenhagen
“I'll go use the key.
You all wait here.”{PAUSE}“And watch closely what happens.”

Bugenhagen
“Now, go inside.
Hope may be inside…
Or…”

Bugenhagen
“This was just a screen to project an image!”{PAUSE}“Look!
Look at the image
projected on the screen of the water!”

Bugenhagen
“Ho Ho Hooo!!
It's pale green!!”

{Cloud}
“…{Aeris}.
{Aeris} has already prayed
for Holy.”{PAUSE}“…After I gave up the Black Materia
to Sephiroth…
{Aeris}'s words came into
my dreams…”{PAUSE}“She said, she was the only one who could
stop Sephiroth…
And to do that, there was a secret here…”{PAUSE}“That was Holy…
That's why, she had the White Materia.
{Aeris} knew about here…
and what she had to do.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris} has left us great hope.
But, it cost her life…
her future…”

{Cloud}
“I'm sorry…{Aeris}.
I should have figured this out sooner.”{PAUSE}“…You left without saying a word…
It was all so sudden, I couldn't think…”{PAUSE}“That's why it took so long for me to find out…
But, {Aeris}…I understand now.”{PAUSE}“{Aeris}…
I'll do the rest.”

{Barret}
“The thing {Aeris} left for us…
We gotta take care of it.”

{Red XIII}
“We can't waste what
{Aeris} left for us.”

{Cid}
“The flower girl gave us a big chance…
It'd be sad if we didn't finish it!”

{Cait Sith}
“What {Aeris} left us…
We mustn't let go to waste…”

{Vincent}
“The hope she left us…
We must make stronger…”

{Yuffie}
“We've gotta take a chance on
the hope she left us!”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris}'s voice has already reached
the Planet.
Just look at the glow of
the White Materia.”{PAUSE}“But…how about Holy?
How come Holy isn't moving?”

{Cloud}
“…Him…”{PAUSE}“He's the only one that could do it.”

{Cait Sith}
“…whisper…whisper…
(sorry
I was a little surprised).”

{Cait Sith}
“You remember when the Junon Cannon
disappeared?
Actually, Rufus moved it.”

{Cait Sith}
“You remember when the Junon Cannon
disappeared?
Actually, Rufus moved it.”

{Cloud}
“Moved it? That big thing?
Where? Why?”

{Cait Sith}
“Rufus wants to destroy Sephiroth with it.”

{Cait Sith}
“That cannon operates on Huge Materia.
But the Huge Materia has already
been used in the Rocket Plan.”{PAUSE}“So since the cannon's useless right now,
he decided to move it.”

{Cait Sith}
“To a place where Materia…
no, where Mako is gathered…”

{Cloud}
“I didn't notice it the last time I came.”

{Cloud}
“This place…is similar to the inside
of the Lifestream.”

{Cloud}
“…The noise doesn't go through your ears
but directly into your head.”

{Cloud}
“It seems to mean something…
but I can't quite get it.
I hate not knowing what it is.”

{Tifa}
“My head feels like it's getting crushed.”

{Cid}
“My head feels like it's gettin' crushed!”

{Barret}
“My head feels like it's gettin' crushed.”

{Red XIII}
“My head feels like it's getting crushed.”

{Cait Sith}
“My head, it's about to be crushed.”

{Vincent}
“My head is about to be crushed.”

{Cloud}
“So {Aeris} came here, too…
She stood in this exact spot…”

{Cloud}
“Hmm…
{Aeris} didn't have to come here.”{PAUSE}“She was able to find out all the
information here.”{PAUSE}“What {Aeris} needed was that
altar…and only that.”

{Cloud}
“{Aeris}…
“{Aeris}…
What were you planning to do?”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, I hear you.
Sorry for what happened.”

{Aeris}
“Then, why don't you REALLY worry about it?”

{Aeris}
“So you don't have a breakdown, okay?”

{Aeris}
“This forest leads to the {CYAN}City of the Ancients{WHITE}…
and is called the {CYAN}Sleeping Forest{WHITE}.”

{Aeris}
“It's only a matter of time before Sephiroth
uses Meteor.”{PAUSE}“That's why I'm going to protect it.
Only a survivor of the Cetra,
like me, can do it.”

{Aeris}
“At least it should be.
…I feel it.
It feels like I'm being led by something.”

{Aeris}
“Then, I'll be going now.
I'll come back when it's all over.”

Sephiroth
“Hmm…
So she's going to interfere?
She'll be a difficult one, don't you think?”

Sephiroth
“We must stop that girl soon.”
